item.title: And Then There Was Light!
item.description: Humans are like kids in the Universe, slowly growing familiar and waking up to our surroundings. These acts of realizing what we’ve been experiencing all along is called discovery. Let’s examine seemingly disparate discoveries, and an equation to bind them all. This examination has a non-technical conclusion, I swear!S First is electricity. Do you remember rubbing plastic ruler on hair and holding it to tiny pieces of paper attracts the paper?

item.title: Where it all started!
item.description: The Big Bang! I have often found myself looking up at the sky and wondering the point of our measly existence in the grandest scale of universe. I was awestruck to truly understand the consequence of galaxies/ stars that are lightyears away from us.It seems really unimaginable that if such a star were to disappear today (in star’s today), we would only observe that event after so many years, because light takes so long to travel!
